messages.message: It would be great to be able to reorder the fields in build mode - this came from a customer who had used the platform themself, and wanted to change the output schema in the excel
Perhaps a slightly interactive export tool could enable that functionality

Travis my preference would be to change the order in the app.

This has been a frustration for me with ML Studio as well. e.g. you create the 10 fields to extract, then realize you need to add 2 more fields. Those 2 additional fields end up at the bottom of the list of fields for annotating. And by luck it seems like those 2 fields are always logically related to the first field that was created. But now they are separated by all the other fields that require annotations.

btw we’ve added this feature to ML Studio in 23.07!

we currently don’t have plans yet to include this in AI Hub, unless Natasha has already come up with designs for this :sweat_smile:
